vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.36.26;
son of: Dishon (H1787);
brother of: Eshban (H0790), Ithran (H3506) and Cheran (H3763)
Also named: cham.ran (חַמְרָן "Hemdan" H2566)
§ Hemdan = "desire"
the eldest son of Dishon, son of Anah the Horite
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Disón; descendiente de Seír
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
欣但 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "渴望"
底順的長子, 底順是何利人亞拿的兒子 (創 36:26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
欣但 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "渴望"
底顺的长子, 底顺是何利人亚拿的儿子 (创 36:26)
